descriptionType.name: descriptionType

options.name: Set Automatically
options.description: Automatically set based on resource and operation

options.name: Set Manually
options.description: Manually set the description

descriptionType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.ai_hint: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。 与鉴权相关，注意不要在公共日志中输出敏感信息。

resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation

options.name: Create
options.description: Create a new project

options.name: Delete
options.description: Delete a project

options.name: Get
options.description: Get a project

options.name: Get Many
options.description: Get many projects

options.name: Update
options.description: Update a project

operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

name.name: name
name.description: The name of the project to create
name.ai_hint: The name of the project to create

otherProperties.name: otherProperties

options.name: assignee
options.description: Set Assignee on the task. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: assignee_status
options.description: Set Assignee status on the task (requires Assignee)

options.name: completed
options.description: Whether the task should be marked completed

options.name: due_on
options.description: Date on which the time is due

options.name: name
options.description: The new name of the task

options.name: liked
options.description: Whether the task is liked by the authorized user

options.name: notes
options.description: The task notes

options.name: projects
options.description: The project to filter tasks on. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

otherProperties.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

options.name: options
opt_fields
options.description: Defines fields to return. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

options.name: opt_pretty
options.description: Whether to provide “pretty” output

options.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

workspace.name: workspace
workspace.description: The workspace in which to get users. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
workspace.ai_hint: The workspace in which to get users. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

id.name: id
id.description: The ID of the project to update the data of
id.ai_hint: The ID of the project to update the data of

filters.name: filters

options.name: assignee
options.description: The assignee to filter tasks on. Note: If you specify assignee, you must also specify the workspace to filter on. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: opt_fields
options.description: Defines fields to return. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

options.name: opt_pretty
options.description: Whether to provide “pretty” output

options.name: project
options.description: The project to filter tasks on. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: section
options.description: The section to filter tasks on. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: workspace
options.description: The workspace to filter tasks on. Note: If you specify workspace, you must also specify the assignee to filter on. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: completed_since
options.description: Only return tasks that are either incomplete or that have been completed since this time

options.name: modified_since
options.description: Only return tasks that have been modified since the given time

filters.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

projectId.name: projectId
projectId.description: Project to show the sections of. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
projectId.ai_hint: Project to show the sections of. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

section.name: section
section.description: The Section to move the task to. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
section.ai_hint: The Section to move the task to. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

searchTaskProperties.name: searchTaskProperties

options.name: completed
options.description: Whether the task is marked completed

options.name: text
options.description: Text to search for in name or notes

searchTaskProperties.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

isTextHtml.name: isTextHtml
isTextHtml.description: Whether body is HTML or simple text

text.name: text
text.description: Comment as HTML string. Do not use together with plain text.
text.ai_hint: Comment as HTML string. Do not use together with plain text.

additionalFields.name: additionalFields

options.name: archived
options.description: Whether to only return projects whose archived field takes on the value of this parameter

options.name: team
options.description: The new name of the task. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

additionalFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

project.name: project
project.description: The project where the task will be removed from. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
project.ai_hint: The project where the task will be removed from. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

tag.name: tag
tag.description: The tag that should be added. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
tag.ai_hint: The tag that should be added. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

userId.name: userId
userId.description: An identifier for the user to get data of. Can be one of an email address,the globally unique identifier for the user, or the keyword me to indicate the current user making the request.
userId.ai_hint: An identifier for the user to get data of. Can be one of an email address,the globally unique identifier for the user, or the keyword me to indicate the current user making the request.

team.name: team
team.description: The team this project will be assigned to. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
team.ai_hint: The team this project will be assigned to. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

updateFields.name: updateFields

options.name: color
options.description: Color of the project

options.name: due_on
options.description: The day on which this project is due. This takes a date with format YYYY-MM-DD.

options.name: name
options.description: The name of the project

options.name: notes
options.description: Basic description or notes for the project

options.name: owner
options.description: The new assignee/cardinal for this project

options.name: privacy_setting
options.description: The privacy setting of the project

options.name: team
options.description: The team this project will be assigned to. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

updateFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

conditional_rules: IF descriptionType == 'manual' THEN SHOW parameter 'toolDescription'
IF resource == 'subtask' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'subtask' THEN SHOW parameter 'taskId'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'subtask' THEN SHOW parameter 'name'
IF resource == 'subtask' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'otherProperties'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'subtask' THEN SHOW parameter 'taskId'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'subtask' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'subtask' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'subtask' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'task' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'task' THEN SHOW parameter 'workspace'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'task' THEN SHOW parameter 'name'
IF operation == 'delete' AND resource == 'task' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF operation == 'get' AND resource == 'task' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'task' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'task' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'task' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF operation == 'move' AND resource == 'task' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF operation == 'move' AND resource == 'task' THEN SHOW parameter 'projectId'
IF operation == 'move' AND resource == 'task' THEN SHOW parameter 'section'
IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'task' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF operation == 'search' AND resource == 'task' THEN SHOW parameter 'workspace'
IF operation == 'search' AND resource == 'task' THEN SHOW parameter 'searchTaskProperties'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation IN ["create", "update"] THEN SHOW parameter 'otherProperties'
IF /operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'name'
IF resource == 'taskComment' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation == 'add' AND resource == 'taskComment' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF operation == 'add' AND resource == 'taskComment' THEN SHOW parameter 'isTextHtml'
IF operation == 'add' AND resource == 'taskComment' AND isTextHtml == False THEN SHOW parameter 'text'
IF operation == 'add' AND resource == 'taskComment' AND isTextHtml == True THEN SHOW parameter 'text'
IF operation == 'add' AND resource == 'taskComment' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation == 'remove' AND resource == 'taskComment' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'taskProject' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation == 'add' AND resource == 'taskProject' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF operation == 'add' AND resource == 'taskProject' THEN SHOW parameter 'project'
IF resource == 'taskProject' AND operation == 'add' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation == 'remove' AND resource == 'taskProject' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF operation == 'remove' AND resource == 'taskProject' THEN SHOW parameter 'project'
IF resource == 'taskTag' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation == 'add' AND resource == 'taskTag' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF operation == 'add' AND resource == 'taskTag' THEN SHOW parameter 'tag'
IF operation == 'remove' AND resource == 'taskTag' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF operation == 'remove' AND resource == 'taskTag' THEN SHOW parameter 'tag'
IF resource == 'user' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation == 'get' AND resource == 'user' THEN SHOW parameter 'userId'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'user' THEN SHOW parameter 'workspace'
IF resource == 'project' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'project' THEN SHOW parameter 'name'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'project' THEN SHOW parameter 'workspace'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'project' THEN SHOW parameter 'team'
IF resource == 'project' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation == 'delete' AND resource == 'project' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF operation == 'get' AND resource == 'project' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'project' THEN SHOW parameter 'workspace'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'project' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'project' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'project' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'project' THEN SHOW parameter 'workspace'
IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'project' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'project' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
